people_also_ask.question: What is the meaning of Ikaruga?
people_also_ask.heading: a shoot 'em up
people_also_ask.heading2: Wikipedia. Ikaruga. Ikaruga (Japanese: 斑鳩) is a shoot 'em up developed by Treasure.
people_also_ask.title: What does ikaruga mean? - Definitions.net

people_also_ask.question: How many levels are in Ikaruga?
people_also_ask.heading: five stages
people_also_ask.heading2: Gameplay. Ikaruga is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up. The game features five stages, three levels of difficulty, and supports single-player or two-player cooperative modes.
people_also_ask.title: Ikaruga - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.question: How long does it take to beat Ikaruga?
people_also_ask.heading: about 1½ Hours
people_also_ask.heading2: When focusing on the main objectives, Ikaruga is about 1½ Hours in length. If you're a gamer that strives to see all aspects of the game, you are likely to spend around 185 Hours to obtain 100% completion.
people_also_ask.title: How long is Ikaruga? | HowLongToBeat
